alert.note: Alert for Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 11:14AM EDT until March 28 at 2:51AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Scioto River at Circleville. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Scioto River at Circleville. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Lowland flooding continues along the river and about one foot of water can be expected along portions of Island Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Monday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling, remaining below flood stage. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
